Text:
Hello Papa', how's summer treating you?
Really well I hope, with sunshine, cold beer and good music to accompany you, just as I have (now). Again, thank you, and have a great summer!

Hahaha, I guess not! I myself have a few weeks left but they will not be spent on the beach, but on a "hobby". Have been landscaping my garden (that means shovelling dirt), and am now making my house beautiful (that means scraping paint from a very tall ladder). Ah yes, I am also pissing my neighbours off, as they seem to have very little understanding of the pleasures of the music from our digital age...   ;-)
Just when we thought he had abandon us for good he shows up like Jack In The Box with yet another excellent compilation. Thanks Papa !

"Ernst with better taste in music".... Hahahahahaha, that really cracked me up!

On a different note; I heard about Arvika, sorry man. You had tickets? It's a real sad time if they are crashing for good. I wasn't going this year because of my work, but I really wanted to.
How on earth did I miss this one? thx man!
